message.content:
cs.LO, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SE, cs.PL 

This paper deals with the automation of reasoning in access control logics, which is a topic that falls under several sub-categories of computer science. The most likely category is cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) since the paper discusses the embedding of access control logics in simple type theory and the use of a higher-order theorem prover. The second likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) since access control is a fundamental aspect of security. The third likely category is cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) since the paper discusses the automation of reasoning using a theorem prover. The fourth likely category is cs.SE (Software Engineering) since access control is an important aspect of software security. The fifth likely category is cs.PL (Programming Languages) since the paper discusses the translation of access control logics into modal logic.
